description: Ayano is Yuko`s best friend and Reika`s older sister who like her friend works as a school teacher at the same high school Yuko teaches at and her younger sister attends. After comforting Yuko with lesbian foreplay in the shower after Yuko got raped by her ex-lover, she introduces Yuko to a research project that she`s been working on involving a magic dagger, a centuries old scroll with foreign writing, and a box containing the decomposed remains of a demon`s phallic genitalia that had been chopped off. When she learns that the demon penis belonged to a legendary monster known as The Lust Demon, she worries for Yuko`s safety especially after she notices her friend`s odd behavior, then learning too late that Yuko has become possessed by the Lust Demon as well as becoming the Lust Demon herself.
name: Ayano
